mapper.select: SELECT c.id as commentId, c.father_id as fatherId, c.article_id as articleId, c.comment_user_id as commentUserId, c.comment_user_nickname as commentUserNickname, c.content as content, c.create_time as createTime, f.comment_user_nickname as quoteUserNickname, f.content as quoteContent FROM comments c LEFT JOIN comments f ON c.father_id = f.id WHERE c.article_id = #{paramsMap.articleId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
